question: I am a Diabetic and a Vegan.I am a 29 year old woman and I weigh 60KG (or I did the last time I weighed myself).I would like some information on a Vegan diet while being a Diabetic. I have been Diabetic for 13 years. I think I am doing all I can, but I want to make sure I get everything right.This discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/352619.
title: Vegan and Diabetic
